description:
BrightSign's free authoring software allows you to easily create, publish and manage digital signage presentations that run flawlessly on BrightSign players. It offers an enhanced and unified BrightSign experience with a common user interface, workflow and feature set available for PC, Mac and a Chrome web browser.
Securely connect to BSN.cloud enabled players to take advantage of new real time player controls as well as robust network and content management tools. With BrightAuthor:connected you can experience a fully connected interface to BSN.cloud and BrightSign players at all levels.
author: BrightSign
